workwithzoo.sourceofprofit

Class Enclosure

  • java.lang.Object
    • workwithzoo.sourceofprofit.Enclosure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClimateObserver, Buyable, Losseable

    public class Enclosure
extends Object
implements Buyable, Losseable, ClimateObserver
    The class of the aviary. In future must have BuilderFactory for create Enclosures into the zoo. Enclosure updates climateUpdate for all animals, which he contains. If the thermoregulation is disabled, enclosure gives to animals outGlobalClimate
    Since:
    26.11.2017
    Version:
    1.0.3
    Author:
    DantalioNxxi
    See Also:
    Buyable, Losseable, Climate, ClimateObserver, Zoo

      • updateClimate

        public void updateClimate(Climate.TypeClimate newClimate)
        Description copied from interface: ClimateObserver
        Using by observers, which sign under notification about changing outClimate.
        Specified by:
        updateClimate in interface ClimateObserver
        Parameters:
        newClimate - given climate from global outClimate
        See Also:
        Using by Pattern Observer and use Pattern Observer for accept outClimate and transfer to intoAnimals. If thermoretulation is disabled, then he will accepts outCLimate.

      • setClimate

        public void setClimate(Climate.TypeClimate newClimate)
                throws EnclosureClimateException
        Sets newClimate by using thermoregulation. If thermoregulation system did not set early, then throw exception.
        Parameters:
        newClimate - in the type Climate.TypeClimate
        Throws:
        EnclosureClimateException - if enclosure does not support thermoregulation.

      • setClimate

        public void setClimate(String newClimate)
                throws EnclosureClimateException
        Sets newClimate by using thermoregulation. If thermoregulation system did not set early, then throw exception.
        Parameters:
        newClimate - in the String type, who will parse to Enum Constant Climate.TypeClimate
        Throws:
        EnclosureClimateException - if enclosure does not support thermoregulation.

      • offClimate

        public void offClimate()
        Disables thermoregulation, if this system was setted early. If enclosure do not supporn this system, print a warning.

      • setThermoregulation

        public void setThermoregulation()
        Set the thermoregulation system into an enclosure.

      • addAnimal

        public void addAnimal(String name,
                      Animal a)
               throws EnclosureStoreException,
                      EnclosureClimateException
        Adds animal into enclosure.
        Parameters:
        name - nickname of the adding animal
        a - adding animal
        Throws:
        EnclosureStoreException - if enclosure if full or adding animal with similary nickename.
        EnclosureClimateException - there are animal, who does not like current inner climate.

      • removeAnimal

        public void removeAnimal(String name)
                  throws EnclosureStoreException
        Removes animal from the enclosure.
        Parameters:
        name - nickname of animal,
        Throws:
        EnclosureStoreException - if into Enclosure there is not animal with such nickname.
